wedding_bouquets_description: In addition to wedding bouquets and arrangements, we offer arrangements for vehicles (car arrangements), table arrangements for halls, churches, and homes, as well as bouquets and arrangements tailored to your wishes and requirements.
grave_wreaths_description: For sad occasions, we offer grave bouquets and wreaths, as well as coffin arrangements made from all types of flowers in all combinations. Delivery is possible to most cemeteries in and around Zagreb upon prior arrangement.
special_occasion_flowers_description: For holiday and celebratory occasions, we offer a colorful selection of bouquets and arrangements. Advent decorations, wreaths for doors, Easter arrangements, Valentine’s Day bouquets, birthday bouquets, bouquets for christenings, confirmations, promotions, and special arrangements for All Saints' Day.
custom_bouquets_description: We create custom bouquets for offices, agencies, medical practices, and other business spaces, restaurants, cafes, clubs, birthdays, promotions, anniversary celebrations, and various events.
additional_offer_description: Whether you are looking for an elegant bouquet for a special occasion, a unique floral arrangement, or a small token of appreciation, you will find the perfect choice with us.

contact_us_description: We are here for you at any moment - contact us with confidence. Reach out to us for any information and orders. We take care of every detail because your questions and needs are our priority.
funeral_services_24h_description: A 24-hour service for the transportation of the deceased.
coffin_offer_description: Do you need only a specific product or one of our funeral services? We are available for all your inquiries.
urn_offer_description: Do you need only a specific product or one of our funeral services? We are available for all your inquiries.
coffin_offer_detailed: Our offer includes a wide selection of high-quality coffins, tailored to different financial possibilities of our clients. In addition to selling flowers and funeral accessories, we offer transportation services for the deceased.
candles_and_lanterns_offer_description: Find a wide selection of lanterns in our assortment.
transport_service_description: We carry out the pickup and transport of the deceased daily, 24 hours a day, from homes, apartments, hospitals, forensic medicine institutions, and nursing homes.
welcome_to_flower_shop: Welcome to Flower Shop Melani, where every flower tells a story.
flower_shop_description: Our flower shop offers a beautiful selection of fresh, hand-crafted floral arrangements that bring comfort, beauty, and significance to every occasion. Whether you are looking for elegant bouquets, sympathy flowers, or a special arrangement for an unforgettable event, we are here to provide you with simplicity and warmth.
flower_shop_services_description: We offer bouquets, pre-arranged floral collections for quick purchase, and individual flower stems, allowing customers to create personalized bouquets according to their preferences and occasions.
special_flower_packages: Our flower shop provides wonderful options such as flower boxes, luxurious floral arrangements, and related gifts. Our gift packages creatively combine flowers with chocolates, plush bears, or wine, creating thoughtful and diverse presents.
wedding_flower_services: We provide wedding flower services, including bouquets, venue decorations, and floral arrangements tailored to create the perfect atmosphere for your dream wedding. Our decoration services also specialize in various garden and floral arrangements for special occasions.
custom_flower_arrangements: We offer customized floral arrangements tailored to customer preferences, seasonal availability, and event themes. Centerpiece arrangements are designed for events, enhancing ambiance and aesthetics for every occasion.
vases_and_accessories: Our flower shop offers a variety of vases in different sizes for storing floral arrangements. Additionally, we provide baskets, wraps, and greeting cards, offering customers diverse options for elegant presentations.
flower_delivery_service: We provide convenient same-day or scheduled flower delivery services, ensuring freshness and personalized gifts. Customers can ensure timely delivery of their flowers, adding beauty to every occasion.
our_story_description: Welcome to our flower shop in Supetar! Located in the heart of Supetar on the beautiful island of Brač, our flower shop is a place where natural beauty and creativity come to life. Whether celebrating special moments, expressing emotions, or bringing a touch of freshness into your home, you will find the perfect floral arrangements for every occasion with us.
valentines_day_quote: "Love is like a flower, blooming with care and tenderness."
artificial_flowers_description: Choose from a high-quality selection of artificial flowers in our offer.
location_details: Flower Shop Melani - Ulica Mladena Vodanovića 4b, Supetar, Croatia.
customer_support: When you need floral arrangements and support, we are here for you with love and care.
transport_service_intro: In moments of losing a loved one, it is most important to have someone who will understand, support, and discreetly take care of all the farewell details. Melani is here to ease these difficult days and help you bid farewell to your loved ones with due care, love, and respect.
transport_service_details: Our staff ensures discreet, safe, and professional transportation of the deceased from hospitals, homes, or any location requiring transport, regardless of distance and borders.
transport_service_formalities: We take care of every detail of funeral formalities, including administrative processes, obtaining documentation, and the necessary permits.
death_case_procedure: What to Do in Case of Death
transport_equipment: Our modern transport ensures a dignified transfer of the deceased.
death_case_procedure: How to act when a death occurs?
death_procedure_step_1: Call the police at 192. Soon, a medical team or coroner will arrive to review the deceased person's medical records and issue the necessary permits for burial and body transportation.
death_procedure_step_2: Once the coroner completes their work, feel free to contact us for body transfer arrangements and funeral planning.
home_death_case_description: In the event of a death at home, first call the police at 192. A medical team or coroner will review the deceased person's medical history and issue the necessary permits for burial and transportation.
hospital_death_case_description: After the hospital informs you of the death, you can contact us for body transfer and funeral arrangements, including clothing transport to the pathology department or mortuary.
abroad_death_case_description: If your family wishes to transport a deceased person or exhumed remains from abroad to Croatia for burial, we will organize the entire process, including obtaining all necessary documents.
artificial_flowers_intro: Choose from our selection of high-quality artificial flowers available in our collection.
artificial_flowers_description: Artificial flowers are decorative elements made from various materials such as plastic, silk, paper, metal, or even 3D-printed materials, designed to replicate the appearance of real flowers.

quote: "If you choose to see the beauty in life, you'll find that every moment blooms like a flower."

Our decoration services are also specialized in various garden/floral arrangements for a range of special occasions.
